notesItems.name: listmaps
notesItems.text: Returns a list of all current #hashtag mappings.

notesItems.name: default
notesItems.text: Choose a different {{platform}} address to be set as Default.

notesItems.name: map
notesItems.text: Add new {{platform}} address to your list mapping.

notesItems.name: ignore
notesItems.text: Disable notes forwarding to your default address.

notesItems.name: notes-reset
notesItems.text: Erase all your notes channels and data

workflowyItems.name: #urgent#דחוף
workflowyItems.text: Start a message with #urgent to put it in an `urgent tasks` list in WF to receive a daily reminders.

helpItems.name: feedback
helpItems.text: Allows you to send feedback or report a bug

skillItems.text: Turn phone numbers into WhatsApp chat links
skillItems.name: contact

skillItems.text: Create an original image given a text prompt
skillItems.name: image

skillItems.text: Forward WhatsApp to email or productivity app
skillItems.name: notes

commands:
Help commands:
1. 🪲 *feedback* - Allows you to send feedback or report a bug
2. 🚮 *delete* - Delete your Fredo account
3. 📗 *learn* - Visit our knowledge base
4. 🕐 *timezone* - Edit your timezone for reminders
5. 💤 *mute* - Turn on/off notification from Fredo
skills:
Fredo Skills:
4. 🎙 *transcribe* - Voice messages to text
5. ⏰ *reminder* - Set reminders
6. 🕐 *TIMEZONE* - Edit your timezone for reminders
7. 💬 *gpt* - Talk to OpenAI GPT-3.5
8. ☎️ *contact* - Turn phone numbers into WhatsApp chat links
9. 🏞️ *image* - Create an original image given a text prompt
10. 📰 *tldr* - Summarize articles (by URL)
11. 🗑️ *notes* - Forward WhatsApp to email or productivity app
12. 📜 *txt* - Extract text from images
dont_understand:
Not sure I follow.
Please check the list of commands I sent earlier, or click help.
fredo_knowledge:
Check out our knowledge base on all things Fredo.
 https://help.fredo.ai
list: Here are the main skills to help you stay productive:

📝 *Notes* 
Connect Fredo to your inbox and favorite productivity apps to send tasks, ideas, and more directly from WhatsApp. 

👉 Send *notes* to learn more.

⏰ *REMINDER* 
Ask Fredo for a reminder and it will notify you when the time comes.

👉 Send *reminder* to learn more.

🎙 *TRANSCRIBE* 
Easily turn WhatsApp voice messages into text by sending (or forwarding) them to Fredo.

👉 Send *transcribe* to learn more.

🤖 *Chat with GPT* 
Start a conversation with ChatGPT by sending *"gpt"* at the start of your question.
For example: *"gpt, what is ChatGPT?"*

👉 Send *gpt* to learn more.

🏞️ *IMAGE* 
Create images from text by sending *img* or *image* followed by a specific description of what you want to see.
Adding details to the main subject and background, such as lighting, mood, posture etc, will yield better results.

👉 Send *img* to learn more.

📰 *TLDR*
Summarize online articles by sending *tldr* followed by the article link.

👉 Send *tldr* to learn more.

📜 *TXT*
Extract text from images by appending *txt* to an image sent to Fredo.

👉 Send *txt* to learn more.

Star these messages for later reference.
Now,

You can always send *Help* to bring back this list, or visit our knowledge base at help.fredo.ai
